document_data.name: Merivold Pony Park
document_data.mainbody: '''Merivold Pony Park''' was a small [[pony]] ranch found in the town of [[Triboar]]. It was run by two sisters, [[Janna Merivold|Janna]] and [[Leera Merivold]].
document_data.Location: It was located on the east side of town, just north of the [[Evermoor Way]].
document_data.Structure: The Pony Park comprised a small and charming cottage, a small paddock enclosed within a picket fence, and a vivid barn adorned with a weather vane wrought into the shape of a pony.
document_data.Services: The Merivold sisters bred, reared and trained ponies that were then sold as steeds for [[halfling]]s.
